description: This leaves just one doc fix for me left, the field list, which I've just about got done.
title: Updating data type creation

content.raw: All these classes need entries in the API docs to be referenced this way.
content.html: All these classes need entries in the API docs to be referenced this way.

content.raw: I'd rather actually just remove the references -- would that be okay?
content.html: I'd rather actually just remove the references -- would that be okay?

content.raw:
But why? I thought it was better to have more cross-references.  There are very similar items in the API docs right now already:

http://yt-project.org/docs/dev-3.0/reference/api/api.html#base-classes
content.html:
But why? I thought it was better to have more cross-references. There are very similar items in the API docs right now already:

http://yt-project.org/docs/dev-3.0/reference/api/api.html#base-classes

content.raw: It looks like those are the ones I want to be referencing.
content.html: It looks like those are the ones I want to be referencing.

content.raw: Aside from comment below, this looks good.
content.html: Aside from comment below, this looks good.

content.raw: I think the PRs got mixed.
Oh I see that it was intentional.
content.html: Oh I see that it was intentional.

content.raw: Sorry about that.  Probably not worth backing it out.
content.html: Sorry about that. Probably not worth backing it out.

content.raw: No problem--they're both going in anyway so no big deal.
content.html: No problem--they're both going in anyway so no big deal.

content.raw: Anyone opposed to merging this in right now?
content.html: Anyone opposed to merging this in right now?

content.raw: I thought we were waiting on @jzuhone to update the field list docs, or is that in another PR?
content.html: I thought we were waiting on John ZuHone to update the field list docs, or is that in another PR?

content.raw: That will have to be another PR, john can't update Matt's PRs.
content.html: That will have to be another PR, john can't update Matt's PRs.

content.raw: This will have to be another PR. I am working on it right now, planning on having it finished this afternoon, at some point.
content.html: This will have to be another PR. I am working on it right now, planning on having it finished this afternoon, at some point.

content.raw: I pulled from Matt, so whatever I do will be based on this.
content.html: I pulled from Matt, so whatever I do will be based on this.
